medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset right lower quadrant abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was in her typical state of health when she developed vague mid abdominal pain, which prompted her to take Tums and go to bed early. Around 1 am, she was awoken by a resurgence of the pain, which prompted her to present to the ED after calling her PCP's office. The pain was acute in nature, and she was afebrile with no nausea or vomiting but experienced vague stomach upset.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Dengue Fever twice in the past; C-section x1.
